title: Machu Picchu
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,817 words, Level Z1 (Grade 5+), Lexile 1090L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     M and V
description: High in the Andes Mountains of Peru sits the stone city of Machu Picchu, built by Inca Indians in the fifteenth century. Students will learn about the site's remarkable architecture and agricultural ingenuity, and they will love the photos of this ancient city in its stunning natural setting.
